column18: Gain resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing DMG from weapons.
Create 4 glowing, hovering objects that shed light out 10 ft. Can move 60 ft.
Advantage on CHA checks to target, who knows magic used once spell ends.
Object sheds light in 20 ft. radious. Hostile targets get DEX save.
Create spectral hand that manipulates objects. Can pick up <= 10 lbs.
Mends one break or tear no larger than 1ft. in a mundane object.
Point at target and whisper a message. They can whisper a response.
Create illusory sound or image. Investigation check against spell DC to detect.
Create minor magical effect.  See Sourcebook.
Next turn you gain advantage on first attack against the target.
Disadvantage to attack.DAM increase.5th level:2d4,11th level:3d4; 17th level:4d4
Charm beasts with INT <= 3; spell fails if you hurt beast
Targets' attack rolls and saving throws are deducted 1d4.
Charm target so it treats you as friendly. Gets advantage to save if fighting you.
Know literal meaning of any speech. Understand written words while touching.
HEAL: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. No effect on undead or constructs.
Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.
Create illusion to appear as someone else.  Foiled by Investigation vs. spell DC.
Target immediately uses reaction to move as far away as possible.
Objects/creatures in cube are outlined in light and are attacked with advantage.

column10: small feather or piece of down
column18: Targets' descent slows to 60 ft. per round, takes no DAM, and can land on feet.
Target HEAL 1d4 + spellcasting ability. No effect on constructs/undead.
Immune to being frightened. Temp HP equal to casting ability modifier each turn.
Learn what an item is and what spells affect it.
Write magical script on surface that only designated people can read.
Target's speed increases by 10 ft.
Create visual-only illusion. Use action to make it move. Investigation to discover.
5d8 total HP of creatures in area fall asleep. Go in order of lowest HP to hightest.
Understand and speak to beasts. Get info about nearby locations and monsters.
Target (INT > 4) is prone, incapacitated, can't stand. WIS save each turn to end.
Creatures failing save and objects pushed 10 ft. Boom heard for 300 ft.

column10: piece of string, bit of wood
column18: Create invisible force that can perform simple, menial tasks for you.
Beast will relay 25 word message to a target you describe
Target becomes blind or deaf (your choice).
Suppress charm effects or hostility on target.
DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area.
Charm humanoid to attack your target of choice.  Use action to keep control.
Read thoughts of those around you.  See Sourcebook.

column10: fur or feather from a beast
column18: Target creature gains a beneficial effect.  See Sourcebook.
Disadvantage to see anybody but you; attacked ones have advantage to save.

column10: piece of iron and a flame
column18: Heat metallic objects including weapons and armor.  See Sourcebook.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn.
Target becomes invisible. Ends if target attacks or casts a spell.
Open mundane lock or suppress an Arcane Lock for 10 minutes. Loud knock.
End one disease or condition (blind, deaf, paralyzed, poisoned) on target.
Name a kind of beast or plant and find the nearest one within 5 miles.
Sense object direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
Magic mouth repeats <= 25 word message once condition is met.
Affect target with illusion. Can DAM for 1d6 Psychic. See Sourcebook.

column10: pinch of talc and silver powder
column18: See invisible and ethereal creatures.
Inorganic creatures have disadvantage to save. Objects take DAM too.
Creatures in area are deafened, immune to thunder DMG, can't cast verbally.
Target follows reasonable course of action you suggest. Can specify conditions.
You know which fail saves. They can't lie but know of spell and can be evasive.
Curse target.  See Sourcebook.
Create sensor in area you can see or hear through.
End spell <= 3rd level. For >= 4th level, casting ability check DC=10+spell level.
Targets drop everything and use Dash to run away. WIS save once out of sight.
Creature appears dead.  Resists all non-psychic DMG. Disease/poison delayed.
Create a magical trap.  See Sourcebook.
Creatures charmed, incapacitated, speed = 0. Spell ends on DAM or shaking.
Protect <= 9 creatures in hut from spells, creatures, elements.
Create image of object including sounds, smells. Investigation check to foil.
Hide target from all divination and scrying magic.
Cast short term (creatures move 1/4 speed) or long term (double food yield).

column10: short piece of fine copper wire
column18: Send <= 25 word message to known creature. Get similar reply.
Ask corpse <= 5 questions. Get brief, cryptic answers. Can be lies.
Animate plants to communicate with and perform tasks.  See Sourcebook.
Creatures that need to breathe spend turn retching. Wind disperses cloud.
Target understands any spoken language and is understood by everyone else.
Compel targets to move in specified non-hazardous direction.
Targets can't take reactions and do random actions.  See Sourcebook.
Teleport yourself and ally to location. If occupied, 4d6 force DAM and spell fails.
Immune to difficult terrain,slow,paralyze,restrain. Spend 5ft to escape restrain.
Become invisible until spell ends.

column10: stone, twig, bit of green plant
column18: Make natural terrain seem like other terrain. Investigation check to disbelieve.
Sense creature direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
Transform creature's form. All stats change. Limited to actions of new form.
Animate objects to accept simple commands.
Target with INT <= 3 gaints INT 10 and can speak. Charmed for 30 days.
Charm humanoid to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.
Shape creature's dreams.  See Sourcebook.
Target must perform task you set. 5d10 psychic DAM whenever it disobeys.
End a debilitating effect on target.  See Sourcebook.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn. Doesn't work on undead.
Learn lore about target. Information is accurate but might use figurative words.
Creatures HEAL 3d8 + casting ability modifier. No effect on undead/constructs.
Become invisible and create illusory double. Use action to move your double.
Reshape another creature's memories.  See Sourcebook.
Bind celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to serve you for spell duration.
Return target to life with 1 HP.  See Sourcebook.
Spy on a target located on the same plane as you.  See Sourcebook.
Disguise willing or unwillig creatures as other similar creatures, including outfits.
Any stepping inside circle teleport to permanent teleportation circle.
Affect targets negatively.  New target each turn.  See Sourcebook.
Find the shortest, most direct route to a place you are familiar with.
Protect an area of space.  See Sourcebook.
Make creatures accept reasonable sounding suggestions. See Sourcebook.
No movement.Disadvantage on DEX saves and attacks.Use action to WIS save.
Create illusion that performs specific action triggered by specific action.
Target creature gains truesight, sees secret doors, Ethereal Plane. Range 120 ft.
Become ethereal.  Move up/down at half speed.  Can't see past 60 ft.
Creatures stuck in cage can only leave using magic after CHA save.
Create audo,visual,tactile, and olfactory illusion. Only Truesight can detect.
Summon portal to 50000 cubic ft. mansion with food for 100 people.
Use bonus action each turn to move sword <= 20 ft. and attack again.
Create image of self you can see/hear/speak/move (x2 speed) through.
Target HEAL 1 HP at start of every turn. Severed parts return after 2 minutes.
Resurrect dead creaature. See Sourcebook.
Inscribe harmful magical glyph on surface.  See Sourcebook.
Teleport yourself and willing creatures to a distant location.  See Sourcebook.
Charm monster to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.
Creature INT and CHA scores become 1.  See Sourcebook.
Can replace CHA check rolls with a 15. Spells always detect you telling truth.
Target immune to psychic damage, charm, mind reading, divinations.
Target <= 150 HP is stunned. Nothing otherwise. CON save at end of turn to end.
Not surprised. Advantage:attacks,checks,saves. Disadvantage getting attacked.
Target also cured of charm, fright, paralyze, or stun. Use reaction to stand up.
If target has <= 100 HP, it dies instantly. No effect otherwise. No saving throw.
Transform a creature/object into a different creature/object.  See Sourcebook.
